about_the_game:
"Urgent Message" is a post-apocalyptic survival game that combines text-based exploration with turn-based combat. In this world full of dangers, you will drive a car, navigate through desolate cities, and race against time to reach your destination, seeking a glimmer of hope for survival.

Game Features:

  • Text Exploration: Every step is a choice. Encounter random events, interact with survivors, and face various survival challenges.

  • Turn-Based Combat: Confront sudden enemies using your skills and collected items to overcome the threats.

  • Time Limit: Drive your vehicle to the destination within the given time. Manage your time and resources carefully to ensure your survival.

In this world, the road is never easy, and survival is never simple. Can you overcome all the obstacles and reach the final destination in time? The answer lies in your hands.
